<a id="Separator"></a>

# Separator

**Inherits:** [Control](Control.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [HSeparator](HSeparator.md), [VSeparator](VSeparator.md)

Abstract base class for separators.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Abstract base class for separators, used for separating other controls. **Separator**\\ s are purely visual and normally drawn as a [StyleBoxLine](StyleBoxLine.md).

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Theme Property Descriptions

<a id="Separator_theme_constant_separation"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[int](int.md) **separation** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#Separator_theme_constant_separation)

The size of the area covered by the separator. Effectively works like a minimum width/height.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Separator_theme_style_separator"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[StyleBox](StyleBox.md) **separator** [ðŸ”—](#Separator_theme_style_separator)

The style for the separator line. Works best with [StyleBoxLine](StyleBoxLine.md) (remember to enable [StyleBoxLine.vertical](StyleBoxLine.md#StyleBoxLine_property_vertical) for [VSeparator](VSeparator.md)).
